description: A 146,000-year-old skull discovered in Harbin, China, has been confirmed as Denisovan using ancient DNA and protein analysis. Named “Dragon Man,” the fossil is the most complete Denisovan specimen to date, offering a new understanding of human evolution and Denisovan presence across Ice Age Asia.
title: China’s Dragon Man Skull Found to Belong to Denisovan Lineage

description: A physicist explains the science behind Mars’s red appearance, linking its hue to iron oxide or rust. While known as the Red Planet, rover images and telescope data show varied colors, from tan to white ice caps. Observations in ultraviolet and infrared light reveal deeper insights into Mars’s atmosphere, surface, and seasonal changes, enriching planetary science.
title: Is Mars Really Red? A Physicist Explains the Science Behind Its Colour and More

description: NASA confirms comet C/2014 UN271, the largest known from the Oort Cloud, is chemically active. Detected by ALMA from far beyond Neptune, the comet’s carbon monoxide jets offer rare insights into icy body chemistry and early solar system conditions.
title: Scientists Spotted the Largest Comet Lying in the Solar System’s Outskirts with Outbursting Gases

description: A SpaceX Starship rocket exploded during a static fire test at the Starbase facility in Texas, causing significant damage but no injuries. Preliminary findings suggest a pressurised tank failure in the rocket’s nosecone. Despite recent setbacks, SpaceX remains committed to its Mars mission, backed by NASA and a newly approved expansion in Starship launch frequency
title: SpaceX Starship Rocket Explodes During Ground Test at Texas Launch Pad

description: The third entry in the Doom revival trilogy, Doom: The Dark Ages switches things up by weighing down the Doom Slayer and bringing melee weapons to the mix. The familiar rotating cast of devastating guns returns, but they’re all essentially playing side fiddle to the new Shield Saw that lies at the red-hot core of game.
title: Doom: The Dark Ages Review: Rip and Tear, Medieval Style

description: NASA has delayed the Axiom Mission 4 launch, citing the need for more time to evaluate the ISS after recent repairs to its Zvezda module. The agency and its partners are reviewing upcoming launch windows while ensuring the space station is fully prepared to receive the international crew led by Peggy Whitson.
title: NASA Postpones Axiom Mission 4 Launch to Ensure Space Station Readiness After Repairs

description: Save Nalla Prasanga follows the storyline of a youngster named Kannan, who believes foreign women are casual about relationships, especially after his confession with his childhood crush. So later, in order to alter his good-guy image, he, along with his friend Pallan, gets into a pact to lose their virginity. So Kannan finds Jessica, a French girl who is settled in Pondicherry. At the same time, Pallani targets his uncle's fiancee. At first, what seems like fun and games turns out to be an emotional rollercoaster of consequences and growth. The series is now streaming on Aha Tamil.
title: Save Nalla Pasanga Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know About Romantic Web Series

description: Yugi, the Tamil crime thriller directed by Zac Harriss, unravels a web of deceit, surrogacy exploitation, and justice. With strong performances and a complex narrative, the film premieres on Aha from June 20, 2025. Don't miss this dual-language mystery ride!
title: Yugi Tamil Movie Now Streaming on Aha: A Gritty Tale of Crime, Surrogacy, and Revenge

description: Lovely is a Malayalam fantasy drama embedded with comedy and emotions. This Mathew Thomas starrer is a story about a lonely man who develops a friendship with a talking housefly. The movie is full of emotions and delivers a unique friendship duo. Currently streaming on Prime Video.
title: Lovely Now Available on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About Malayalam Fantasy Drama

description: Salakaar, directed by Faruk Kabir and Mouni Roy in the lead role, is a thrilling series about a spy who is connecting two covert operations. The course of national security once challenged the young spy. The story is based on actual events, and the series is filled with layered narrative and intrigue, action, and emotional intensity.
title: Salakaar OTT Release: When and Where to Watch Mouni Roy Starrer Spy Thriller Online?

description: The Hunt - The Rajiv Gandhi Assassination Case is a web series that follows the investigation of the assassination and uncovers shocking truths. The series has been written and directed by Nagesh Kukunoor. Streaming starts from July 4th, 2025, on Sony LIV.
title: The Hunt- The Rajiv Gandhi Assassination Case OTT Release Date Revealed
